findings.rationale: An indefinite term may expose the Disclosing Party to prolonged risks as confidentiality obligations last forever, leading to potential liabilities if the Receiving Party improperly uses the information.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The agreement does not specify restrictions on how the Receiving Party may use the Confidential Information, which could lead to misuse or unauthorized application of sensitive information.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.
